name: The Stanley Matthews Football Challenge
description:
Welcome to The Stanley Matthews Football Challenge, a little game made for the Stoke-On-Trend Games Jam, with the theme of the Stanley Matthews statue.

In this game, you'll play as an amateur football player training under the guidance of Stanley Matthews himself. You'll be tasked with completing five obstacle courses that you must guide your ball through.

Only the best of the best are able to collect every star and achieve the "goal" number of kicks in each course. Do you think you have what it takes?
